thread.title: Greenville-Based Apparel Company Launches Kickstarter Campaign to Introduce Colorful Socks
thread.title_full: Greenville-Based Apparel Company Launches Kickstarter Campaign to Introduce Colorful Socks | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Greenville-Based Apparel Company Launches Kickstarter Campaign to Introduce Colorful Socks
text:
(MENAFN Press) 



Stesso unveils its inaugural sock collection on the popular crowdfunding site 
Greenville S.C. - Stesso LLC a Greenville-based apparel start-up offering premium quality clothing products launched a Kickstarter campaign in order to introduce their inaugural sock collection and gather sufficient funds to meet initial manufacturing costs. The campaign will run from August 31 until October 5 and the company's goal is to reach 4000 in funding. 
Stesso whose design philosophy is deeply rooted in traditional southern styles with a blend of modern designs and cultural influences from around the globe introduced eight sock designs as part of its launch collection. With product names such as “The Golden Boot” “The Triple Play” and the “The Dream Team” among others Stesso also looks to sports for influence during the design process. Backers are able to pledge as little as 11 or as much as 1000 depending on the reward they choose. 
“We are very excited to have the opportunity to introduce our project after working relentlessly to develop it from concept to creation” said Mario Cuadros founder of Stesso. “Offering more than just socks Stesso prides itself in providing an avenue for individuals to unveil their personality and create their identity. We wanted to provide these individuals with an opportunity be a part of our journey which is why Kickstarter is the appropriate venue to launch our products.” 
Kickstarter is a funding platform where creative innovative and imaginative projects are brought to life through the direct support of project backers. Backers that support a project on Kickstarter get an inside look at the creative process and get to choose from a variety of unique rewards offered by the project creator. Funding on Kickstarter is all-or-nothing meaning no one will be charged for a pledge towards a project unless it reaches its funding goal. 
Other aspects about the company include the “Sock Madness Tournament” which is a contest where college students can showcase their talents by submitting a design for an opportunity to have it displayed on a pair of socks while adding it to their professional portfolio. Stesso is also committed to donating a percentage of their profits to various cancer organizations. 
About Stesso 
Founded in 2015 Stesso LLC is a Greenville-based apparel company involved in the design marketing and distribution of premium quality fashion products. Stesso was founded from the desire to provide an avenue for individuals to unveil their personality and create their identity. The company's guiding principle is to provide comfortable fashionable products that will initiate the journey to join a growing culture that is inspired to express their passion pride and style. 
For more information about Stesso please visit www.stessostore.com
